TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontStretch extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 描述字型相對於字型一般外觀比例的縮放度數。

span.span: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字型縮放描述的字型表單會自動縮放從其一般外觀比例，這是原始的寬度和高度指定的字型中字符的比率。A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font. 值會對應至`usWidthClass`中的定義[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)]規格。The values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. `usWidthClass`代表 1 和 9 之間的整數值，較低的值表示較窄的寬度; 較高的值表示較寬的寬度。The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9—lower values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths. |字型縮放Font stretch|usWidthClassusWidthClass|一般的 %% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||11|50.0%50.0%| ||22|62.5%62.5%| ||33|75.0%75.0%| ||44|87.5%87.5%| ||55|100.0%100.0%| ||66|112.5%112.5%| ||77|125.0%125.0%| ||88|150.0%150.0%| ||99|200.0%200.0%| 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]`usWidthClass`值，請參閱["字型檔案資料表 」](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm)區段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)]規格。For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 比較 物件的兩個執行個體。

span.span: Compares two instances of objects.

returns.span: 一個 值，表示兩個 執行個體之間的關聯性。

span.span: An value that represents the relationship between the two instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當傳回值小於零時，`left` 小於 `right`。When the return value is less than zero, `left` is less than `right`. 當此值為零時，即表示兩個運算元相等。When this value is zero, it indicates that both operands are equal. 當此值大於零時，即表示 `left` 大於 `right`。When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that `left` is greater than `right`.

summary.span: 比較 的兩個執行個體是否相等。

span.span: Compares two instances of for equality.
